evidence_span: The effects of variations in the beta-quench parameters during the tube reduction process on the final microstructure and microchemistry of Zircaloy-2 and Zircaloy-4 cladding were studied by TEM/STEM and correlated with corrosion rates in 400 and 500°C steam autoclaves.

evidence_span: The Process A Zircaloy-4 specimens revealed only one type of ternary particles, Zr(Fe,Cr)₂, but with much higher Fe/Cr ratios and mean particle size than those of the corresponding particles in Zircaloy-2.
